name: Elisco's Creative Cafe
description: All agencies have suits. We have aprons. Ok, so we're a bit quirky. We have a passion for exceptional service, original thinking - and food. So we decided to combine our passions into a new kind of venue: a restaurant-like setting, where we serve fresh ideas daily and free lunch once a week for our clients. We also have special dinners and wine tastings. Basically, we just want to conduct business in a warm and friendly atmosphere that's conducive to creative thinking.
